text:
[Verse]
Sunrise waking up the sky
Feet in sand the waves roll by
Golden light and endless blue
Summer dreams come true

[Verse 2]
City lights fade out of view
Lost in time me and you
Palm trees swaying to the beat
Summer days so sweet

[Chorus]
Oh these summer dreams
Life is what it seems
Laughing in the night
Everything feels right

[Verse 3]
Dancing under moonlit skies
Shining stars in our eyes
Every moment feels so free
Summer dreams with me

[Bridge]
No more worries no more fears
Just the music in our ears
Holding on to memories
Summer’s gentle breeze

[Chorus]
Oh these summer dreams
Life is what it seems
Laughing in the night
Everything feels right
title: Summer Dreams
